name: Mad Missiles!
description:
Try to control an out of control missile system and safe the day! (or get fired trying)
Your supervising engineer Dr Dr Space Toni wants you to supervise the new demonstration of the K'OS AI missile system.

You are in charge if any of the autonomous systems are out of control.

Fast paced action game where you manually control multiple missiles. Keeping track of everything that happens on the battlefield, hitting enemies and avoiding civilian ships with your missiles! 

All in   A E S T H E T  I C   80's Synthwave!

This game was created as part of the 2020 gmtk jam. The theme was out of control.

Programming, Game Design and 3D Models were made in the 48 hours, the rest are third-party assets.

Have fun and good luck!
